TopicTitle: Sound Selector for Breaking Ground engines

Articles.Content: Just a wild idea: Since it's really hard to determine what an propeller engine would sound like given the modular nature of the game's propellers and motors, why not provide a sound library for the player to choose from? Or perhaps associate a sound font for each propeller part and play it when the motor is running. At least that way, the propellers won't be silent when running...

Not a bad idea! 

What if there were to be just a constant prop sound that would play, get louder as throttle is increased? I dunno, just a though, mr. fox...

I mean this is the nicest way possible, but the stock water is trash. As Matt Lowne said, could squad pay the modders and implement mods like scatter into the base game? I am not a techno-wizard by any means, so if this really isn’t plausible please tell me.
